thread.title: Darshan's Mr Airavatha makes Rs 15 crore?
thread.title_full: Darshan's Mr Airavatha makes Rs 15 crore? - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Darshan's Mr Airavatha makes Rs 15 crore?
text:
Though Darshan's latest movie, Mr Airavatha — in which he is paired with Bollywood actress Urvashi Rautela — has got mixed reviews, the movie seems to be breaking records. It was first in the news for being the only Kannada film to be released in 40 theatre abroad, and now, it is being estimated that Mr Airavatha managed to rake in Rs 15 crore over its opening weekend.
This figure is based on the fact that the movie collected Rs 8.50 crore on the opening day alone. Sources in Gandhinagar have revealed that the Challenging Star's latest commercial endeavour continues to do roaring business, but we'll wait for official figures to come in. Watch this space for more.
